bug.short_desc: Evaluate possibility to fake elipsis in firefox

long_desc.thetext:
Here are two links how a jQuery plugin has faked the not available elipsis for text in firefox. We should check if a solution like that could work in qooxdoo too. Especially the performance could be a problem for a lot of labels.
http://devongovett.wordpress.com/2009/04/06/text-overflow-ellipsis-for-firefox-via-jquery/ http://dl.dropbox.com/u/534786/jquery.text-overflow.js

As expected, the performance is horrible. I tried the original jQuery script with 100 labels which is a small amount of labels in a qooxdoo application. Usually there are more than 1000 labels available. But the performance with 100 labels was too bad (took more than 6 seconds apply the ellipsis). --> As long as firefox does not support the CSS text-overflow we don't have a chance.
